# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, considering its worth to both parties. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
